Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the PRRA officer erred in determining that Mr. Lebedev was not a Convention refugee or at personal risk of harm upon return to Russia
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review following unsuccessful refugee claim and PRRA application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: PRRA officer questioned credibility but court found assessment flawed
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Evidence of systemic human rights abuses in Chechnya, prison conditions, military hazing
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution due to refusal to serve in Russian military in Chechnya
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Well-founded fear of persecution; personal risk of torture, cruel treatment, or death
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Systemic human rights abuses in Chechnya and conditions in Russian prisons
Crimes.Application_Error: Dismissed credible evidence, focused on applicant's 'resourcefulness' over objective risks
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision overturned and remitted for redetermination
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Objective risk assessment required under IRPA
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Credible reports of systemic abuse in Chechnya and harsh prison conditions
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Well-founded fear standard under s. 96; personal risk under s. 97
Crimes.Application_Factor: Risk of detention and mistreatment due to draft evasion
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB), Federal Court on review
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in fact and law in assessing risk
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubt about systemic nature of abuses and lack of international condemnation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient consideration of country condition evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Concerns about inadequate reasoning and failure to engage with key evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Officer questioned credibility; court found this unjustified
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Russia, specifically Chechnya and military service context
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to properly assess personal risk under s. 97
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to consider relevant evidence of systemic abuse

Crimes.Crime_Name: Using false documents for the purpose of entering Canada
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Entitlement to refugee status under IRPA s. 96 and s. 97 based on fear of persecution for refusing military service
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review after denial by Immigration and Refugee Board and PRRA application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: PRRA officer expressed doubt; court found assessment flawed
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Reports on human rights violations in Chechnya, military hazing, prison conditions
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution and personal risk due to refusal to serve in Chechnya
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Well-founded fear of persecution; personal risk of torture or cruel treatment
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Potential complicity in human rights abuses and risk upon return
Crimes.Application_Error: Misinterpreted need for international condemnation; insufficient analysis of personal risk
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision quashed, legal questions certified, case remanded
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Objective assessment of personal risk and well-founded fear
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Evidence of severe prison conditions and systemic military abuse
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Well-founded fear under s. 96; risk of torture under s. 97
Crimes.Application_Factor: Refusal to participate in military operations involving human rights abuses
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB), Federal Court on review
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in law regarding interpretation of international response and risk assessment
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of proof of personal risk and skepticism about systemic abuses
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to adequately analyze available country condition evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Deficient reasoning and lack of substantive engagement with evidence
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false documents to enter Canada
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Officer raised doubts; court found these not justified by record
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inadequate explanation for rejecting key evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to assess personal risk under s. 97 properly
